title: Replace X post URLs with plain text while preserving embeds

requirements.summary: Replace X post URLs in message text with plain text 'X Post' while preserving embedded previews
acceptanceCriteria: X post URLs in message text are replaced with the plain text 'X Post'
The text 'X Post' is not clickable or linked
Embedded X post previews continue to display below the message
Change applies to all existing messages containing X post URLs
Twitter widget rendering functionality remains intact

file_operations.description: Add text processing logic to detect X/Twitter post URLs in message content and replace them with the plain text 'X Post' (non-clickable). Preserve the existing Twitter embed rendering below the message text by ensuring the mediaUrl and mediaType fields remain unchanged. Apply the URL replacement only to the displayed message text without modifying the underlying data structure or the embed preview rendering logic.
